Articles.Content:
Hey !

I'm pretty sure most of us really like David Bowie (or at least some of his songs). So, yesterday, while watching a KSP version of Space Oddity, I thought it would be nice to add something to the game in his memory. I'm not talking about something big, just a spider or Duna, or a "Major Tom" rocket booster...

What do you guys think about it ?
Welcome to the forums! Also I've thought about making a Z1-GY Stardust Collector, like from this probe: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stardust_(spacecraft)

8 minutes ago, legoclone09 said:

Welcome to the forums! Also I've thought about making a Z1-GY Stardust Collector, like from this probe: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stardust_(spacecraft)

I like it
